title: Ive been getting a bunch of bug splats lately when I never have before.
body: I think that this patch did something and I the game will crash just about every other game before the game has started.

replies.body: There's not a whole lot of information to go off of here, but if you're seeing the bugsplat with Heimerdinger then some of the game files might actually be corrupted. Hit up this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and the steps there should be able to get your client back on track.
